title: the CORRECT ways to say "AND/ALSO" in Japanese　とか, し, たり, で, そして, と, も, あと, や

media:group.media:title: the CORRECT ways to say "AND/ALSO" in Japanese　とか, し, たり, で, そして, と, も, あと, や
media:group.media:description:

In this video, I am going to teach you how to say "AND" / "ALSO" in Japanese.
Did you know that there are A LOT of ways to say "AND" other than "TO"?
と
も
や
とか
し
たり
て
で
あと
そして
それに
さらに
